Author: Speakingevil
Description: Swap the six keys into the right order about a pivot key, based on their colours, labels, and positions, while avoiding forbidden configurations. Tags: 6-buttons, 6-colors, numbers, highlightable-display
Name: Reordered Keys

Souvenir.Explanation: Souvenir could ask about the colors of the keys and the numbers on them in any given stage, or which key was the pivot key.
